tool_description: ExpressVoic is a versatile Text-to-Speech (TTS) API designed to effortlessly transform written text into lifelike speech. Seamlessly integrated, it offers developers a robust solution for generating high-quality audio content from textual input.
name: Express Voic (text to speech)
title: Express Voic (text to speech)

api_list.name: getAllVoice
api_list.description: The getAllVoice endpoint returns a list of text-to-speech providers, categorized by language and accent, with available male and female voices.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://express-voic-text-to-speech.p.rapidapi.com/getAllVoice"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "express-voic-text-to-speech.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

url = "https://express-voic-text-to-speech.p.rapidapi.com/getAllVoice"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",

print(response.json())

api_list.name: getAudioLink
api_list.description: The getAudioLink endpoint generates an audio URL for a given text, utilizing a specified voice from a chosen text-to-speech service

optional_parameters.name: text
optional_parameters.default: This is a sample text that will be converted into audio.

api_list.name: getVoice
api_list.description: The getVoice endpoint fetches designated voices from a specified text-to-speech service.

api_list.name: getServices
api_list.description: The getServices endpoint provides a comprehensive list of text-to-speech (TTS) service providers available for integration.
api_list.code:

url = "https://express-voic-text-to-speech.p.rapidapi.com/getServices"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "express-voic-text-to-speech.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
